ygData.subject: Re: Bronze Armor, a little explanation please?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I assume you don t have any significant armor now? You ll have to wait until you can collect leather, better ring or banded.  Go fight something that you
ygData.messageBody:
--- Jason <IB_Jason@...> wrote:

> I have heard about absorbtion of armor, but do not
> understnad the mechanics/formula/general idea behind
> it.

I assume you don't have any significant armor now?
You'll have to wait until you can collect leather,
better ring or banded. Go fight something that you
can find a lot of (orc, goblin, wolf, bear); wear all
your armor and fight it. When you're done, go fight
it without wearing your armor.

You'll take notably more damage without the armor.

Does that answer your question?

===
:D
